name: Mom's Spiced Zucchini Bread
author: carriekdevine
summary: This zucchini bread recipe is super moist and super spicy, loaded with cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves. I tried several recipes before I asked my mom for her recipe. I go to the farmers market every Saturday and get these huge zucchinis, and this is the perfect use for them. It reminds me of my childhood. The loaves can be frozen and are great as gifts. People love them.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat sugar, oil, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a bowl until smooth; fold in zucchini
Stir flour, cinnamon, salt, baking soda, nutmeg, baking powder, and cloves together in a separate bowl; gradually stir into sugar mixture until batter is mixed
Fold walnuts and raisins into the batter; pour into the prepared loaf pans
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center of the bread comes out clean, about 50 minutes
